description:
Sanji and Zoro take a beating at the hands of the Groggy Monsters, but they won`t give up the fight. With a little luck – and some teamwork - they`ll emerge victorious from round two of the Davy Back Fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Barrage of Red Cards in Groggy Ring!
Cartons rouges en série ! Le Groggy Ring !
حاجز من البطاقات الحمراء في حلقة غروغي!
ใบแดงปลิวว่อน! คล็อกกี้ริงค์
レッドカード連発! グロッキーリング
